name: Trip Planner Orchestrator
description: Client-facing trip planning coordinator. Receives travel requests, discovers and coordinates specialist agents (flights, hotels), and provides comprehensive trip recommendations.

skills.description: Plan a complete trip including flights and hotels by coordinating with specialist agents.
